review: UPDATE OCT 2, 2009 This used to be a raving 10/10 review of Rushmore, Wes Anderson's best film. I no longer have any respect for West Anderson and will not support his work. Wes Anderson has revealed himself as an apologist for child molesters.Roman Polanski, Wes Anderson's colleague and friend, was finally arrested for drugging and forcibly sodomizing a 13 year old girl in 1977. The convicted child molester (and coward) fled the US the day before his sentencing, and lived in exile in France for the past thirty years. On September 26 Polanski was finally arrested on a standing warrant in Switzerland, who unlike France, has an extradition treaty with the United States. Three days later, Wes Anderson signed a petition demanding the immediate release of the convicted child molester, citing dismay over the arrest and defending Polansky's freedom as a renown artist.
